feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Migratig to a new website with better layout

link.title: Migratig to a new website with better layout

entry.content: Last year, I participated in a seminar on Mechanistic Interpretability, and a lot of our topics were blogposts from Anthropic, Lesswrong and Distill. I was quite inspired by the websites, as not only were they very informative and exciting, they were also a pleasure to look at. I am hence migrating my website to the current template.
entry.summary: Migrating to a new website with a better layout for better readability.
